hooks.command: if [ "$(uname)" = "Darwin" ]; then osascript -e 'display notification "Claude needs your attention" with title "Claude Code"'; elif command -v notify-send >/dev/null 2>&1; then notify-send 'Claude Code' 'Claude needs your attention'; fi; printf '\a'

if [ "$(uname)" = "Darwin" ]; then afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Glass.aiff; elif command -v paplay >/dev/null 2>&1; then paplay /usr/share/sounds/freedesktop/stereo/complete.oga; else printf '\a'; fi

file=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.file // ""'); has_proj() { d="$PWD"; while [[ "$d" != "/" ]]; do [[ -f "$d/pyproject.toml" ]] && return 0; d=$(dirname "$d"); done; return 1; }; [[ "$file" == *.py ]] && { if has_proj; then uv run ruff format "$file" && uv run ruff check --fix "$file"; else uvx ruff format "$file" && uvx ruff check --fix "$file"; fi; }; true
